mapper.update: update ecs_admin_message set sender_id = #{sender_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receiver_id = #{receiver_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sent_time = #{sent_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_time = #{read_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readed = #{readed,jdbcType=BIT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where message_id = #{message_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_time, read_time, readed, deleted, title, message from ecs_admin_message where message_id = #{message_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
select message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_time, read_time, readed, deleted, title, message from ecs_admin_message
